title.native: 怪人開発部の黒井津さん
title.english: Miss KUROITSU from the Monster Development Department

description:
Kuroitsu is an assistant researcher in the superhuman research & development department of Agastya, a villainous secret organization that battles with heroes who try to save the world. Kuroitsu lives a busy life in Agastya, caught between the absurd requests of her bosses; making presentations; implementing new features into superhumans; and getting results within the allotted time, budget, and spec requests; all without vacation.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: Kuroitsu-san from the Monster Development Department

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Tokusatsu
tags.description: Prominently features elements that resemble special effects in Japanese live-action shows

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Superhero
tags.description: Prominently features super-powered humans who aim to serve the greater good.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Crossover
tags.description: Centers around the placement of two or more otherwise discrete fictional characters, settings, or universes into the context of a single story.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Transgender
tags.description: Features a character whose gender identity differs from the sex they were assigned at birth.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

title.native: 怪人開発部の黒井津さん

name.native: カノン・サンダーバード
ウォーリア・オブ・ジャガー
ロングレンジ・アンクル

node.description:
__Agency:__ VanCia Entertainment

AXXX1S (アクシス) is a Japanese idol boy group that launched on June 3, 2018. The group was formed through the merge of the boy groups AMAZ (pronounced "amaze", debuted on April 1, 2015) and Once=Crown after some members from both groups left.

Their concept is "royal road + α", which is based on the genre of idol and incorporates the trend and individuality of each member.
**Iida Satoki** is a Japanese freelance sound director.

[Website](https://maybeme.amebaownd.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MAYBEME0707)

Maybe ME is an idol group.
